title: Dynaflux

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Empower another Galactic during the day to restore their abilities.
- Prime your reactor at night.
- Fire off your reactor on a player at night. This resets all primes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you fire off your reactor on a player, if it's been primed once, their ability targets two random players in addition to its original target.
*Overloaded* — When you fire off your reactor on a player, if it's been primed twice or more, their ability targets every player in the game.
*Overloaded* — When you fire off your reactor on a player, if it's been primed three times or more, your ability also targets every player in the game.

desc:
Post 3737
*Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.*
Roleblock and redirect immune while Overloaded
